title: The Greenhouse Effect - Best Of Coast To Coast AM 12/9/19
itunes:title: The Greenhouse Effect - Best Of Coast To Coast AM 12/9/19
description:
George Noory and Steve Gorham discuss the Greenhouse effect. Steve talks about how much the major temperature metrics and how we are not heating up as much as we think we are. Steve gives his opinion on what is really causing the wildfires in California and why it is not climate change.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
